titles.title: Hope Scholarship Credit Expansion Act of 2009
Hope Scholarship Credit Expansion Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow additional expenses for purposes of determining the Hope Scholarship Credit, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Hope Scholarship Credit Expansion Act of 2009 - Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions relating to the Hope Scholarship tax credit to make certain additional expenses eligible for such credit, including room and board, employment-related expenses, and books, supplies, and equipment.
